committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits

official_title: To provide that law enforcement officers and other Federal employees in southern New Jersey be treated, for purposes of certain pay provisions of the Federal Employees Pay Comparability Act of 1990, in the same manner as if they were serving in the New York-Northern New Jersey-Long Island, NY-NJ-CT Consolidated Metropolitan Statistical Area.

summary.text: Entitles Federal law enforcement officers serving in Atlantic, Cape May, Cumberland, Gloucester, or Salem County, New Jersey, to an interim geographic pay adjustment and a special pay adjustment, and entitles other Federal employees serving in those counties to an interim geographic pay adjustment, to the same extent Federal officers and employees serving in the New York-Northern New Jersey-Long Island Consolidated Metropolitan Statistical Area are entitled to such adjustments under the Federal Employees Pay Comparability Act of 1990.

titles.title: To provide that law enforcement officers and other Federal employees in southern New Jersey be treated, for purposes of certain pay provisions of the Federal Employees Pay Comparability Act of 1990, in the same manner as if they were serving in the New York-Northern New Jersey-Long Island, NY-NJ-CT Consolidated Metropolitan Statistical Area.
